mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM THEME_LIST ORDER BY T_LIKES DESC) JOIN THEME_FILES ON(TID=T_CODE_NUMBER) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6 AND T_STATUS='Y'

SELECT TWRITER, TTITLE, TCONTENT, TADDRESS, T_CREATE_DATE, T_MODIFY_DATE, T_VIEWS, T_LIKES, TKEYWORD, T_STATUS, TID, TCODE, T_ORIGINAL_FILE, T_MODIFY_FILE FROM (SELECT TCODE || MAX(TID) xx FROM THEME_LIST GROUP BY TCODE) A JOIN (SELECT TCODE || TID yy, TWRITER, TTITLE, TCONTENT, TADDRESS, T_CREATE_DATE, T_MODIFY_DATE, T_VIEWS, T_LIKES, TKEYWORD, T_STATUS, TID, TCODE FROM THEME_LIST) B on (A.xx = B.yy) JOIN THEME_FILES F ON(B.TID = F.T_CODE_NUMBER)
SELECT * FROM THEME_LIST WHERE TID=#{tId} AND T_STATUS='Y'
